titleStmt.title: The history of the reigns of Edward and Richard II with reflections, and characters of their chief ministers and favourites : as also, a comparison between those Princes Edward and Richard the Second, with Edward the First, and Edward the Third : written in the year 1685 / by the Honourable Sr. Robert Howard.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Robert, Sir, 1626-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Collins for Thomas Fox ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
